text:
Everyone,
good job on the performance.

It’s not much, but here’s a treat
for everyone.

1, 2, 3......
Isn’t there one missing? What about yours, Producer?

Oh, right......
I’m fine, you all have it.

Here, I was going to drink this, but you can have it～
Let’s toast with this!

You usually say
"I'm just watching" and hold back in times like these.

Oh, that’s true～
You do say that often!

Really......? ......If that’s the case,
it might be because I feel like praising myself a little.

Well, I was watching the live
and I thought.

Maybe it’s just the result, but......
I’m glad I was able to bring everyone together.

I guess that really
is called a "miracle".

Then let’s toast
to our "miraculous" encounter!
Haha, and to the success of the live too.
